snippet: Differing assessments of the military threat posed by the United States revealed growing tensions in Iran between hard-liners and the moderate government.
abstract: Mohammad Ali Jafari, highest commander of Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps lashes out at Foreign Min Mohammad Javad Zarif, telling him to stick to diplomacy and stay out of military business.
lead_paragraph: Differing assessments of the military threat posed by the United States revealed growing tensions in Iran between hard-liners and the moderate government.

headline.main: Military Chief in Iran Scolds a Top Official
headline.print_headline: Military Chief In Iran Scolds A Top Official
